title: Pharmacology Blended Learning Education Program: Neuroscience-Based Drug Therapy Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of elementary medical terminology and human body systems
context.additional_context: A hybrid (online/offline) educational environment utilizing digital devices, emphasizing practical application skills for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain at least three cases of neurotransmitter mechanisms and related pharmacological treatments.
Learners can compare drug treatment strategies for neurodegenerative diseases and evaluate/present their clinical application limitations.
Learners can integrate online and offline learning materials to write project reports applying pharmacology knowledge to practical cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
